p: Viral RNA was extracted using the QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit (QIAGEN, Germantown, MD, USA) according to the manufacturerâ€™s instructions. Whole genome amplification of the influenza B genome was performed using the SuperScriptTM III One-Step RT-PCR System with Platinum TM Taq High Fidelity DNA Polymerase (Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, MA, USA) with modifications [ 22].
